metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13401 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Docker Engine before 19.03.11. An attacker in acontainer, with the CAP_NET_RAW capability, can craft IPv6 routeradvertisements, and consequently spoof external IPv6 hosts, obtainsensitive information, or cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
